titleInfo.title: Efficient recycling of a versatile titanocene precatalyst: Significance of side-chain functionalization

mods.abstract: The dramatic influence of the (diisopropylamino)ethyl side chain provides sufficient stability to allow for efficient recycling of Cp(N)Cp(S)TiCl(2) . HCl (2) (Cp(N) = (C5H4CH2CH2NPr2)-Pr-i, Cp(S) = C(5)H(4)SiMe(3)), a precatalyst for the polymerization of ethylene and for the dehydrogenative coupling of phenylsilane, by a simple extraction procedure with methanol and aqueous HCl.
